about_the_game:
Do your maids have enough going-out outfits for 2025?
If not, this is your chance to stock up! Presenting the Lucky Bag 2025 Ver.Empire Costume Collection!
Now your maids will never feel like they have nothing to wear again!

-Costumes-
*Sexy Boyish Set (normal)
*Sugar Frills Set (normal)
*Artless Frills Set (normal)
*Calm Casual Set (normal)
*Girly Assault Set (normal)
*Combat Casual Set (normal)
*Laced-Up Leather Set (normal)
*Simple School Uniform Set (normal)
*Overalls-Style Outfit Set (normal)
*Blouse & Slit Set (normal)
*Girlish Cyber Set (normal)
*Hologram Casual Set (normal)
*Elegant Ribbon Dress Set (normal)
*Cute Snow Dress Set (normal)

-Edit Mode Parts-
-Ankle
*Sheathed Katana
*Katana Sheath
*Katana Sheath: Arm

-Necklace
*Odachi

*Scimitar: Both Hands

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
